overview: The first episode concerns Holly, a physical fitness freak, and the two hot studs who spice up her life. The second sequence revolves around another manhunter who prowls the waterfront and picks up 'able-bodied seamen' to takes them home for Sunday Brunch. The third part features the Sloan Twins as lesbian lovers involved in a menage-a-trois.
tagline: (ˈTī-grəs), female of the species... forever on the prowl!
title: Tigresses
